p: Arguments are being made that the economic costs of social distancing and stay-at-home are worse than the medical catastrophe. However, in the absence of widely available testing facilities, proven pharmacotherapeutics, and the introduction of an effective vaccine, mere lifting of social distancing restrictions will not be effective in ending the economic damage or slow down, as the vast majority of fearful people will not participate in the economic activity. As can be seen during this devastating pandemic, public health and economic goals are mutually exclusive.
